column1: The earth feeds on blood as well as seed.  Witchâ€™s Proverb
Her throne is woven of bones hidden beneath the harvest.  Hermetic Verse
The womb is a tomb, and the tomb is a womb.  Occult Riddle
She who creates also devours; all mothers are two-faced queens.  Esoteric Saying
Abundance is a mask; beneath it sleeps hunger.  Arcane Fragment
The Empress whispers: life and rot are one blossom.  Anonymous Mystical Fragment
